parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. The time must be in UTC and formatted as *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z. The time must be in UTC. The end time must be later than the start time.

Defaults to the current time.

parameters.name: MaxDuration
parameters.description: The longest execution duration. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: MinDuration
parameters.description: The minimum execution duration. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description:
Sort criteria (JSON string). {"Field":"QueryStartTime","Type":"Desc"}

Field: Specifies the field to sort by.

*   QueryID: Query ID.
*   UserName: The username.
*   DBName: The name of the database.
*   QueryStartTime: The start time.
*   QueryEndTime: The end time.
*   DurationTime: The execution duration of the query.
*   Optimizer.
*   LockWaitTime: The lock waiting time.
*   QueueWaitTime: Time in Queue.
*   CpuTimeMs: CPU time.
*   MemBytes: The memory usage.
*   SpillBytes: Spill File Size.

Type: Sort order.

*   Desc: descending.
*   Asc: ascending.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be a positive integer in the range \[1, 100]. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query. The time must be in UTC and formatted as yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ.

Defaults to the current time minus 5 minutes.
